Description: Defines the mandatory structure for immutable indexing of system state commits ($\Psi_{N}$). This index must be finalized and cryptographically signed by the Sovereign Governor Subsystem (SGS) to ensure audit chain integrity, facilitating RRP triage and forensic analysis (TVCR linkage).

EpochID.description: The sequential Deterministic State Evolution ID (\Psi_{N}).

CommitTimestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the state commit was finalized and indexed.

GSM_RootHash.description: The cryptographic root hash of the Governance State Manifest (GSM) for this epoch.

GSM_Pointer.description: Immutable storage location pointer for the GSM artifact.

TVCR_Link.description: Reference pointer to the corresponding Trace and Veto Context Registry (TVCR) instance recorded by SGS. Optional if state transition was unanimous.

SIPM_SelfHash.description: The hash of the entire Index structure (excluding the signature field) calculated using Indexing_Protocol, ensuring index structural integrity.

IndexSignature.description: The cryptographic signature generated by SGS over the SIPM_SelfHash, ensuring non-repudiation of the state commit index.
